definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: timbrel, tambouring ;—abs. ´[[ת]]: Ge 31:27 + ; pl. [[תֻּפִּים]] Ju Jdg 11:34 + ; sf. [[תֻּפֶּ֫יךָ]] Ez Eze 28:13, [[תֻּפַּ֫יִח]] Je 31:4;—timbrel, held and struck with hand, esp. by dancing women, oft. with other musical instr.:—sign of merriment, gladnEss Ge 31:27 (E) Job 21:12, reverly Is 5:12; ´[[מְשׂוֹשׂ ת]]: Is 24:8, cf. Je 31:4, Ez Eze 28:13; exultation, triumph Ex 15:20, Ex 15:20 (E) Ju Jdg 11:34, 1Sa 18:6, Is 30:32; used by prophets in ecstasy 1Sa 10:5; in praise of ´[[י]]: 2Sa 6:5 ‖ 1Ch 13:8, Ps 81:3, Ps 149:3, Ps 150:4.—Vid. Prince:EB Music.§ 3.
